answers.author: Stephanie Klinkenberger
answers.text:
The County of San Mateo, CA lists "Childcare" under their employee benefits with an on-site childcare center.  http://tinyurl.com/3shgc96

author: Marianne Bond
text:
does anyone know of a city/county that provides daycare services for employees as a benefit?
thanks
Marianne
title: municipal provided daycare
